channel.title: !how do i make a npc talk plz help!
channel.description: kk im woundering how to i make a npc talk im using spades-scape and im its a 317 private server for ex i lay down a npc like this (::npc 3876) but he dont talk how do i make it so u can click on it and it talks to you

item.title: !how do i make a npc talk plz help!
item.dc:creator: @djvawter djvawter
item.description:
@djvawter wrote:

well it depends on how you want them to talk. you mean if you click them? or they just talk…like, the text over their head? for them to say something when you click, it would be in client.java…search what they already say then replace it with what you want them to say. save. compile. hope this helped some.

Read full topic
item.source: !how do i make a npc talk plz help!

item.title: !how do i make a npc talk plz help!

@Pkloldie wrote:

Umm Npchandler then look for the npc id and it will probaly say like “WElcome to mod allstar” or somewhat change it to what you want hope this helped you
